name: Supersede Group
description: Supersede Group: Powered By Proforma Albrecht was founded in 2010. Since the beginning, the Supersede Group has provided production, entertainment, and marketing services to some of the nations most distinguished clients. Specializing in live entertainment, DJ services, audio/video production, printing/manufacturing services, marketing consultation and branding, the Supersede Group: Powered By Proforma Albrecht is capable of producing results and solutions for your next event or project.
